  • java.lang.Object

    Direct Known Subclasses:

    public abstract class AbstractAliasStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAliasingStrategy
    Common base class for alias strategies

      • setForwardSolver

        public void setForwardSolver(IInfoflowSolver fSolver)
        Description copied from interface: IAliasingStrategy
        Sets the forward solver. Implementors can use this reference to inject edges for taint aliases at right position.
        Specified by:
        setForwardSolver in interface IAliasingStrategy
        Parameters:
        fSolver - The forward solver performing the taint propagation

      • getForwardSolver

        protected IInfoflowSolver getForwardSolver()

      • hasProcessedMethod

        public boolean hasProcessedMethod(soot.SootMethod method)
        Description copied from interface: IAliasingStrategy
        Checks whether this aliasing strategy has already computed aliases in the given method or not. Strategies that do not want to implement this method should always return true.
        Specified by:
        hasProcessedMethod in interface IAliasingStrategy
        Parameters:
        method - The method to check
        Returns:
        True if this aliasing strategy has alreay computed aliases in the given method, otherwise false.
